Store_Description__c: This beverage dispenser is most commonly used for weddings and other formal events. It heats the product using a fuel canister, and is very pleasing to the eye. It holds 5 gallons of hot liquid, and can be used with everything from hot chocolate to coffee to apple cider! It also works great as a decorative, cold beverage dispenser.
General_Info__c:
To keep the liquid hot you will need a fuel source.
If you need a sterno fuel can you can purchase it through us.
If you are using a heat source you will need to stir the liquid often.
Hot chocolate can scald/burn if not stirred.
There is also a snuffer provided to help control the heat.
One sterno can is $5 and will last 2-3 hours.
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions and watch the required videos so that you come prepared for your rental. We ask that you return the equipment clean. Cleaning and packaging instructions can be found inside the tote. If scalding has occurred please scrub the container to get the burnt product removed.  We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying.  Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

We recommend putting your liquid in hot. The sterno fuel is not an recommended heating source for 5 gallons of water. If heating with the sterno (not warming) it will take several hours (depending on ambient temperature) to become hot and you will need to stir the hot chocolate regularly to avoid scalding. If you are using a heat source you will need to stir the liquid often. Hot chocolate can scald/burn if not stirred. There is also a snuffer provided to help control the heat.

 

Instructional Video

https://youtu.be/n2GKztsMqfg

 

Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation.

Sterno $5 a can (lasts 2-3 hours)
Cancellation_Policy__c:
Items are only reserved with a deposit. If a deposit has not been paid, items are available only on a first come, first served basis.
We have the best cancellation policy out there!
Your deposit will be fully refunded if the rented items are able to be rented to someone else. That means, the more notice we are given - the more likely a refund will be issued. That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.
Acknowledgement__c:
All rentals are for customer pickup and dropoff at our location in American Fork, Utah. We are available to load and unload all customers, unless you use our after-hours drop-off or prefer to load/unload yourself.

To keep the liquid hot you will need a fuel source. If you need a sterno fuel can you can purchase it through us.

If you are using a heat source you will need to stir the liquid often. Otherwise the product can scald/burn.

The sterno fuel source could take 1-2 hours or more to heat the 5 gallons. We recommend heating the product separately, and using the sterno to keep the product hot.

The dispenser should be handled with care, returned clean and dry, and packaged the way it was received.

Any missing parts and/or damaged items will be the renter's responsibility.

Store_Description__c:
There's no better treat than smooth, rich soft serve ice cream! This is the perfect crowd pleaser, and this machine is up for the task! It runs off standard 110v, and is the smallest and most portable commercial machine out there (still weighs over 200lbs)! This Taylor 152 machine is the best quality machine available! A dedicated 20amp circuit is required for this machine. If you need to run the machine with a generator, the generator must have at least a 6000watt starting capacity (you can rent ours under the "Equipment" category). We stock vanilla and chocolate soft serve. For other flavors, please call us for pricing and special order details.
Chocolate or Vanilla Soft Serve = $25 (serves 60-80)
Dole Whip = $35 (serves 50-70)
Cones = $8/60 $12/100
8oz Cups = $7/50 $12/100
General_Info__c:
You will need a 100v plug and a dedicated 20 amp circuit to power the machine.
If you need an extension cord we require you to rent one from us.
This machine is large and a minivan, LARGE SUV (Suburban, Expedition, etc), or truck are needed to transport. If you rent multiple machines you will need a truck.
We also sell the supplies to make the ice cream:
Chocolate or Vanilla Soft Serve = $25 (serves 60-80)
Dole Whip = $35 (serves 50-70)
Cones = $8/60 $12/100
8oz Cups = $7/50 $12/100
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions and watch the required videos so that you come prepared for your rental. We do ask that you return your equipment clean and dry. 

The machine should be plugged into an outlet directly. If you need an extension cord you will need to rent one (50ft) for an additional $5. We ask you to only use a rented extension cord from Plan-it Rentals. We can't certify the condition or gauge of your extension cord, and you will be responsible for any damage done to the machine if it is run with inadequate power. If you plan to run the machine off of a generator, you will need a generator with at least 6000watts of starting power.

The soft serve machine is large. We will NOT load the machine into a car. You will need a van, LARGE SUV (Suburban, Expedition, etc) or truck. If you are renting more than one machine, you will need a truck.

Cleaning instructions can be found in your instructional video. When rinsing the machine, do not pour water in immediately after turning it off. Wait 15-20 minutes with the machine unplugged, or the water will freeze and you won't be able to rinse it through. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Instructional Video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t2uVGL4uDL4

 

Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation.

Extension Cord $5

Soft Serve Ice Cream $25 (serves 60-80)

Dole Whip $35 (serves 50-70)

Soft Serve and Frozen Yogurt (serves 60-80)

Cones $8/60 $12/100

8oz Cups $7/50 $12/100

Store_Description__c: Occupying those little toddlers makes anything easier! This cute little bounce house with a ball pit area is so much fun for a few little kids. It fits 3-5 kids ages 5 and under. Rent 100 play balls for $3, we recommend around 500 balls for a full ball pit. 11x10x8' This bounce house can be transported by one person and will fit in a sedan.
General_Info__c:
This bounce house is for ages 5 and under and 3-5 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a sedan or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 1 person for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house can fit in a sedan and can be lifted by 1 person. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and trunk space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Instructional Video

https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5

Store_Description__c: Our Balloon Bouncer is great indoors and out, and will keep kids occupied with the generous 10'x10' bounce area and basketball hoop! 12'x12'x8'. This bounce house can be transported by one person and will fit in a sedan.
General_Info__c:
This bounce house is for ages 10 and under and 8-10 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a sedan or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 1 person for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house needs an empty sedan or bigger and requires 1-2 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Operating Instructions

Please watch the following video:https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

This bouncer may require two blowers for operation, and the short yellow deflation tube may be used for the second blower. When using two blowers, each blower needs to be on a separate electrical circuit or you may burn up the blower and/or trip your breaker. Often all outdoor outlets are on the same circuit, so you may need to run an extension cord inside to get a different circuit. We have extension cords available to rent for $5. When using extension cords, they must be thick heavy duty cords.

If your bounce house is not inflating, please watch the instructional video again!. You need to make sure you are using all blowers given to you, and that you have zipped up all zippers around the bounce house (there could be up to 3 zippers).

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5

Store_Description__c: Our biggest bouncing house with a cute animal jungle theme! You can fit a crew in here bouncing at once, and it is just and all-around jungle giant! 13'x14.5'x11.5'
General_Info__c:
This bounce house is for ages 10 and under and 8-10 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a mini van, SUV or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 2 people for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house needs a van or bigger and requires 2 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Operating Instructions

Please watch the following video:https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

This bouncer may require two blowers for operation, and the short yellow deflation tube may be used for the second blower. When using two blowers, each blower needs to be on a separate electrical circuit or you may burn up the blower and/or trip your breaker. Often all outdoor outlets are on the same circuit, so you may need to run an extension cord inside to get a different circuit. We have extension cords available to rent for $5. When using extension cords, they must be thick heavy duty cords.

If your bounce house is not inflating, please watch the instructional video again!. You need to make sure you are using all blowers given to you, and that you have zipped up all zippers around the bounce house (there could be up to 3 zippers).

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5
Cancellation_Policy__c:
Items are only reserved with a deposit. If a deposit has not been paid, items are available only on a first come, first served basis.
We have the best cancellation policy out there!
Your deposit will be fully refunded if the rented items are able to be rented to someone else. That means, the more notice we are given - the more likely a refund will be issued. That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.
Acknowledgement__c:
All rentals are for customer pickup and dropoff at our location in American Fork, Utah. All items are due by 9am on the business day following your reservation. We are available to load and unload all customers, unless you use our after-hours drop-off or prefer to load/unload yourself.

Store_Description__c: A true commercial quality chocolate fountain at an unbelievable price! This fountain features 4 tiers, 11 pound chocolate capacity, and an astounding 29" height.
Instructional_Videos__c:
It is highly recommended that you melt the chocolate/product before putting it into the machine. Although the fountain itself does heat, it will take it a very long time to melt your product down. So, we recommend putting the product in a bowl and microwaving it (short intervals stirring often) or melting it in a pot on the stove, stirring often.

To assemble the fountain:
Screw the bowl onto the base of the machine. Do not over-tighten.
Screw the towers onto the bowl. The tower is reverse threaded and has very fine threads. Please do not use excessive force or try turning it the wrong direction. Turn it counter-clockwise to screw it onto the bowl, clockwise to unscrew.
Gently drop the auger through the tower and rotate it by hand until you feel it drop onto the shaft of the motor.
Attach the top tier to the tower and give it a slight rotation to lock it in place.
If your product is not flowing, it is because it isn___t hot enough (the product thins as it gets hotter) or needs oil added to it. We recommend adding a __ cup of oil per 2lbs of chocolate.
If the product isn___t flowing evenly around the towers, the machine needs to be leveled. There are little feet on the bottom of the base that can be adjusted to level the fountain
If the product is not reaching the top tier, it is either because it is too thick, or the intake at the bottom of the towers is clogged. Turn the machine off, scrape away the product from the base of the tower, and then try again.
Closely monitor the temperature of the fountain. You___ll want to occasionally stir the product in the bowl, and you want to make sure the product doesn___t thicken - but also doesn___t burn.

To cleanup the machine:
Turn the machine off and then scoop out as much remaining product as possible.
Allow the machine to cool, and then disassemble the machine (remember the tower is reverse threaded).
Run all parts (except the base/motor, please wipe that clean) under hot, soapy water.
Put all parts carefully back away into the provided storage container, making sure that the parts aren___t scraping and banging against each other.
General_Info__c:
The chocolate fountain needs 6 lbs of chocolate to flow.
We also sell the supplies for the machine if you would like to purchase them from us. We ask that all supply orders be placed 2-3 days before your rental date.
Here is the pricing: https://www.planitrentals.com/product-page/chocolate-fountain
Description__c:
General Instructions

We do ask that you return your chocolate fountain in a clean and organized condition. Pay attention to how it was packaged when you received it and put the items back the same way. Remove any remaining product from the fountain and clean the parts in soapy water. If product (chocolate) is left in the machine, it hardens and makes it very difficult to clean (resulting in a cleaning fee). Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Operating Instructions

It is highly recommended that you melt the chocolate/product before putting it into the machine. Although the fountain itself does heat, it will take it a very long time to melt your product down. So, we recommend putting the product in a bowl and microwaving it (short intervals stirring often) or melting it in a pot on the stove, stirring often.

To assemble the fountain:
*Screw the bowl onto the base of the machine. Do not over-tighten.
*Screw the towers onto the bowl. The tower is reverse threaded and has very fine threads. Please do not use excessive force or try turning it the wrong direction. Turn it counter-clockwise to screw it onto the bowl, clockwise to unscrew.
*Gently drop the auger through the tower and rotate it by hand until you feel it drop onto the shaft of the motor.
*Attach the top tier to the tower and give it a slight rotation to lock it in place.

Troubleshooting:
*If your product is not flowing, it is because it isn't hot enough (the product thins as it gets hotter) or needs oil added to it. We recommend adding a half cup of oil per 2lbs of chocolate.
*If the product isn't flowing evenly around the towers, the machine needs to be leveled. There are little feet on the bottom of the base that can be adjusted to level the fountain
*If the product is not reaching the top tier, it is either because it is too thick, or the intake at the bottom of the towers is clogged. Turn the machine off, scrape away the product from the base of the tower, and then try again.

Closely monitor the temperature of the fountain. You'll want to occasionally stir the product in the bowl, and you want to make sure the product doesn't thicken - but also doesn't burn.

To cleanup the machine:
*Turn the machine off and then scoop out as much remaining product as possible.
*Allow the machine to cool, and then disassemble the machine (remember the tower is reverse threaded).
*Run all parts (except the base/motor, please wipe that clean) under hot, soapy water.
*Put all parts carefully back away into the provided storage container, making sure that the parts aren't scraping and banging against each other.

 

Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation.

2lb Milk Chocolate $15 (serves 12-26 people with 3-5 dips)

100 Skewers $5

Store_Description__c: No party is complete without a dunk tank! This dunking booth collapses down and fits in the back of a truck (it may fit in SOME SUV's or Vans, but Plan-it Rentals won't be liable for any damage done to the interior of your vehicle. Please bring a truck or trailer if possible, we have a trailer for rent if needed). Setup takes less than 3 minutes, and you are ready to fill'er up! The booth comes with everything you need - except water and someone to dunk!
General_Info__c:
We require a truck or a trailer to transport the dunk tank.
If needed we have a trailer you can rent to transport it.
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions and watch the required videos so that you come prepared for your rental. We ask that you return the equipment clean and dry. Hang the dunk tank liner out to dry. Don't put softballs in a tote full of water to return, it ruins them.  We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

It can take 45 minutes to 1 1/2 hours to fill the dunk tank depending on water pressure. Please bring a truck or trailer to transport the dunk tank, you need a 4x6 ft space.

 

Instructional Video

https://youtu.be/_V5eVJpz7F4

 

Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation.

Chlorine Tablet - $5

Trailer - $40 (limited availability)

Store_Description__c: The Rainforest Rapids can be used WET or DRY, for year-round partying. Add optional party balls, and the Tiki Lagoon becomes an adventure ball pit! The dual slides and large pool area make this a favorite for all jungle creatures! 16'x15'x7'. This bounce house requires 2 people to transport and will fit in a van or SUV.
General_Info__c:
This bounce house is for ages 10 and under and 8-10 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a mini van, SUV or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 2 people for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house needs a van or bigger and requires 2 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Operating Instructions

Please watch the following video:https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

This bouncer may require two blowers for operation, and the short yellow deflation tube may be used for the second blower. When using two blowers, each blower needs to be on a separate electrical circuit or you may burn up the blower and/or trip your breaker. Often all outdoor outlets are on the same circuit, so you may need to run an extension cord inside to get a different circuit. We have extension cords available to rent for $5. When using extension cords, they must be thick heavy duty cords.

If your bounce house is not inflating, please watch the instructional video again!. You need to make sure you are using all blowers given to you, and that you have zipped up all zippers around the bounce house (there could be up to 3 zippers).

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5

Store_Description__c: This price is insane - but our booths are even cooler.  All photos can be sent instantly via text or email.  The booth sets up easily in 5 minutes and our booths have the most features on the market. You have complete control over the number of photos per strip, borders, digital props, effects, and more!  It even comes with a random selection of stick props (provide your own props if you want something specific).  You receive a link at the end of your event with all the photos taken.  Your guests will love and rave about it, and so will you!
General_Info__c:

Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions and watch the required videos so that you come prepared for your rental. We do ask that you return the equipment in a clean and organized condition. Pay attention to how items were packaged when you received them and return the in the proper tote/container. Your efforts to take care of our equipment will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!  Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

We require you to put down a tarp for all outdoor events. A cleaning fee will be assessed if the photo booth is returned dirty.

A selection of stick props are included with the photo booth free of charge.  You are welcome to use them, we just ask that you try to handle them gently and return them when finished. Please take good care of our props - we provide them for free, but can't do so if care isn't taken. They are just a random collection of props with no specific theme.  Sticks may fall off of props, and they may also be damaged from rental to rental. We of course go through them quickly between each rental and discard those that are obviously damaged, but our priority is making sure the booth and electronics are inspected, clean, and ready to go for your event. If you would like a specific theme/category or are intending props to be a big focus of the photo booth - you should plan to provide your own.

A link to all photos taken during your event will be provided. Please remember to write down the link before returning equipment.

Store_Description__c: Slush machines add so much fun to any party! From birthday parties to weddings to family reunions, you won't regret adding a colorful, cool treat to your menu. This dual flavor machine was built for serving a crowd!
Instructional_Videos__c:
The machine needs to be leak tested before putting your product into the machine. Do this by filling the product containers with water to the "max" line. If the canister is leaking, empty the water. Remove the leaking canister by lifting slightly in the front, while pulling the canister towards you. Dry off the canister and dry off the white, round seal in the back. Reseat the canister and leak test again.
If you have purchased our slush mix, it comes 1/2 diluted. So, empty the bottle of flavor into the machine, then fill the bottle full of water and empty that into the machine. The machine will take 1-2 hours to freeze, and ambient temperature plays a HUGE part in the length of time it takes. The machine is recommended for indoor use only, and the manufacturer specifies that the machine must be operated in temperatures under 80 degrees.
Plug in the machine, and ensure both augers turn, and that the display reads "Ice" on both sides.
To clean the machine, simply empty the remaining product, and then flush the canisters once or twice with water. Clean out the drip tray, and the black carrying tray of any spills. Wipe the outside of the machine. We will do the major cleaning and disinfecting upon return.
General_Info__c:
You will need a 20 amp circuit to power the machine.
If an extension cord is needed we require you to rent one from us.
The slush machine will not freeze if the ambient temperature is greater than 80 degrees.
Using it in an indoor, air conditioned space is ideal.
You will need a minivan, large SUV or truck to transport.
We also sell the product to put in the machine if you'd like to purchase it from us.
Here is a link to the flavors/pricing: https://www.planitrentals.com/product-page/slush-machine
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions and watch the required videos so that you come prepared for your rental. We do ask that you return your slush machine clean and organized.

 

When you are done serving please remove product from the machine so that the plastic is not stained. Please wipe up spills on cart and any sticky areas. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

The slushie machine is large. We will NOT load the machine into a car. You will need a van, SUV or truck. If you are renting more than one machine, you will need a truck.

The machine should be plugged into an outlet directly. If you need an extension cord you will need to rent one (50ft) for an additional $5. We ask you to only use a rented extension cord from Plan-it Rentals. We can't certify the condition or gauge of your extension cord, and you will be responsible for any damage done to the machine if it is run with inadequate power.

It is not recommended to run the machine outdoors. Warmer temperatures will influence the freezing time. If the ambient temperature is above 80 degrees the machine will not freeze the product.

Finally, we strongly suggest using our mixes for the machine. The sugar content must be between 12% and 15% for the machine to freeze and operate correctly. If the sugar content is too low, the mixture freezes too hard and can break the auger, and break the seal on the machine. If the sugar content is too high, it won't freeze to the proper consistency (or at all)

Operating Instructions

Click here for operating instructions



Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation

Extension Cord $5

Slush Mix $20/2.5 gallons (serves 40, 8 oz cups)

Syrup flavors: Tiger's Blood, Blue Raspberry, Bahama Mama, Wild Cherry, Pina Colada, Lemon-Lime, Root Beer, Dreamsycle, Banana, Blue Hawaiian, Mango, Pink Bubble Gum, Cola, Grape, Strawberry, Watermelon, and Blue Cotton Candy. They are authentic, high quality flavors.

Spoon Straws $5/100

Store_Description__c: The newest craze for group gatherings is bubble ball soccer! There is so much more you can do with these balls (besides soccer) and they are perfect for indoors or outdoors! Our bubble balls are "top of the line" and ready for play! Our medium ball is perfect for participants up to 225 lbs. One pump is included with the rental. Each ball takes 3-5 minutes to inflate, so add extra pumps if you get a lot of balls or are under a time crunch!
General_Info__c:
The medium size ball is for participants up to 225lbs.
When renting 4 or more balls the pump is included.
You can rent a pump if needed for $10.
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions and watch the required videos so that you come prepared for your rental. We do ask that you return your zorb balls in a clean and organized condition. Pay attention to packaging and return the correct ball in the correct bag.  Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

The zorb balls are quite large, a car is not an ideal transport vehicle. You will need a van, SUV or truck.

Setup Instructions

Locate the inflation cap. There should be one with each ball you were given. Inside the pump tote, there should be some extras if needed. Screw in the bottom half of the cap, and then inflate by attaching the hose to the blower side of the pump.
DO NOT OVER-INFLATE THE BALLS!!
If you over-inflate the balls, new holes will be ripped into the ball as the ropes pull tight. The rings where the ropes attach are the weak point of the ball, and is where new holes almost always develop. The balls should be a little bit squishy, not pumped full like a basketball. It is normal to need to re-inflate the balls every 30-45 minutes. There is some temporary patch material in the tote the pump came in, in case of emergency. Once the ball is inflated, tighten the top half of the cap.
To deflate, remove both halves of the cap and allow the air to escape. Reattach the cap for travel, and roll the ball. Make sure the correct size of ball is put back into the correct bag.

Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation

Soccer Equipment (soccer goals, cones, and soccer ball) $10

Additional Inflation Pump $10 (each ball takes 3-5 minutes to inflate)

That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.
Acknowledgement__c:
All rentals are for customer pickup and dropoff at our location in American Fork, Utah. We are available to load and unload all customers, unless you use our after-hours drop-off or prefer to load/unload yourself.

The medium size ball is for participants up to 225lbs.

The pump is included with the rental, it takes 3-5 minutes to inflate a ball. You can rent an additional pump for $10.

A sedan will fit 4-6 balls. An SUV will fit around 10-12 balls. If you order more than 10 balls, please bring a truck.

Please make sure participants are being safe when using the item. Any missing parts and/or damaged items will be the renter's responsibility.

Your deposit will be fully refunded if the rented items are able to be rented to someone else. That means, the more notice we are given - the more likely a refund will be issued. That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.
Acknowledgement__c:
All rentals are for customer pickup and dropoff at our location in American Fork, Utah. We are available to load and unload all customers, unless you use our after-hours drop-off or prefer to load/unload yourself.

The price does not include a propane tank. You can use your own tank(s) or rent ours. Tank rentals are $5 each (find them under the "Winter" or "Equipment" category)

The rented propane tanks needs to be returned full, or it is a $15 charge for each tank for us to fill it.

You will need a lighter to light the heater.

Any missing parts and/or damaged items will be the renter's responsibility.

Store_Description__c: Rent 100 play balls for $3.  We have several ball pit designed bounce houses that these are perfect for!  People even use these in standard bouncers or to put in the pool area of our wet bounce houses (when used wet or dry).  We recommend a minimum of 400-500 play balls for a small ball pit (on our smaller toddler bounce houses).  For our Panda bounce house, we'd recommend 600.  Queen's Carriage and Train Trax would be 800-1000.
General_Info__c: We recommend 2 bags for kids to play around with, and 5 bags or more for a ball pit.  Crushed balls may be disposed of.
Description__c:
General Instructions

We have you reserved for plastic play balls. You will be sent with extra balls, so you are welcome to discard any smashed balls. Please do not sort them by color when returning them. Please be careful not to snag the bags on sharp objects.

Store_Description__c: All aboard the Train Trax Express! Kids will love climbing through the engine, bouncing in the main cabin, and sliding out the caboose! It comes complete with a ball pit, climbing area, and basketball hoop. Rent 100 play balls for $3, we recommend around 800 balls for a full ball pit. This engine is huge, measuring 23'x11'x8.5'!! This bounce house requires 2 people to transport and will fit in a van or SUV.
General_Info__c:
This bounce house is for ages 10 and under and 8-10 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a mini van, SUV or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 2 people for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house needs a van or bigger and requires 2 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Operating Instructions

Please watch the following video:https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

This bouncer may require two blowers for operation, and the short yellow deflation tube may be used for the second blower. When using two blowers, each blower needs to be on a separate electrical circuit or you may burn up the blower and/or trip your breaker. Often all outdoor outlets are on the same circuit, so you may need to run an extension cord inside to get a different circuit. We have extension cords available to rent for $5. When using extension cords, they must be thick heavy duty cords.

If your bounce house is not inflating, please watch the instructional video again!. You need to make sure you are using all blowers given to you, and that you have zipped up all zippers around the bounce house (there could be up to 3 zippers).

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3, we recommend 800 for a full ball pit.

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5

Store_Description__c: Our most popular sound system, because it is just that easy! Bluetooth, AUX, Microphone, AM/FM Radio and the ability to link many of these speakers together make this a powerhouse for any event. Connect as many as you need!  Each speaker comes with 1 microphone and cable, an AUX cable, an extension cable, and a speaker stand.
General_Info__c:
We recommend one speaker for crowds of 75-100.
Two speakers would work for 100-150 people.
Each speaker comes with a speaker stand
The speakers have a built in mixer with 2 XLR or 1/4 inputs. It also has an AUX input, and will pair to bluetooth devices.
Multiple speakers can be connected (wired only) and come with 15ft cables to do so. Add additional extension cables if a larger distance between speakers is needed.

Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

We recommend checking the weather report for the sunset time the day of your movie. Plan to start your movie close to sunset (up to 15 minutes prior to sunset) for optimal viewing with the projector.

This 15ft diagonal screen does NOT include the projector or sound system. You will need to add those items separately.

These screens use a quiet blower that runs continually to keep them inflated.

Projectors do not work when there is ambient light, and will not work during the day. We rent very bright (3000+ lumen) projectors, but they still will not show up on any screen during the day (nor do any projectors). We recommend starting movies 15 minutes before sunset (at the earliest).

These screens will need to be anchored down with the provided tethers and stakes, but in high wind the screen may not be usable.

Any missing parts and/or damaged items will be the renter's responsibility.

You'll save a bundle of money when compared to hiring a Santa, and you get the suit for a full day! We recommend Santa picks the same size as the t-shirt he wears.
General_Info__c:
The suit includes: coat pants, hat, boot covers, wig, beard, gloves and belt.

Please make sure the suit is returned clean and dry. Any missing parts and/or damaged items will be the renter's responsibility.
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions and watch the required videos so that you come prepared for your rental. We do ask that you return the Santa suit clean and organized. The items should be folded and placed nicely in the tote. Care instructions can be found inside the tote.  Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation.

Present Sack - $5

Glasses - $2

Padded Belly - $5
Cancellation_Policy__c:
Items are only reserved with a deposit. If a deposit has not been paid, items are available only on a first come, first served basis.
We have the best cancellation policy out there!
Your deposit will be fully refunded if the rented items are able to be rented to someone else. That means, the more notice we are given - the more likely a refund will be issued. That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.
Acknowledgement__c:
All rentals are for customer pickup and dropoff at our location in American Fork, Utah. We are available to load and unload all customers, unless you use our after-hours drop-off or prefer to load/unload yourself.

The suit includes: coat pants, hat, boot covers, wig, beard, gloves and belt.

Please make sure the suit is returned clean and dry. Any missing parts and/or damaged items will be the renter's responsibility.

Store_Description__c: Our Panda Pad bouncer is on every kid's "A-list"! With a large basketball hoop, ball pit area, bouncing area, and slide - it makes for the perfect party! Rent 100 play balls for $3, we recommend around 600 balls for a full ball pit. 18'x12'x8'.  This bounce house requires 2 people to transport and will fit in a van or SUV.
General_Info__c:
This bounce house is for ages 10 and under and 8-10 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a mini van, SUV or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 2 people for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house needs a van or bigger and requires 2 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Operating Instructions

Please watch the following video:https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

This bouncer may require two blowers for operation, and the short yellow deflation tube may be used for the second blower. When using two blowers, each blower needs to be on a separate electrical circuit or you may burn up the blower and/or trip your breaker. Often all outdoor outlets are on the same circuit, so you may need to run an extension cord inside to get a different circuit. We have extension cords available to rent for $5. When using extension cords, they must be thick heavy duty cords.

If your bounce house is not inflating, please watch the instructional video again!. You need to make sure you are using all blowers given to you, and that you have zipped up all zippers around the bounce house (there could be up to 3 zippers).

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3, we recommend 600 for a full ball pit.

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5

You will need a truck to transport this item
This item requires 4 people for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house needs a truck (or a van/SUV where seats fold flat) and requires 3-4 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Operating Instructions

Please watch the following video:https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

This bouncer may require two blowers for operation, and the short yellow deflation tube may be used for the second blower. When using two blowers, each blower needs to be on a separate electrical circuit or you may burn up the blower and/or trip your breaker. Often all outdoor outlets are on the same circuit, so you may need to run an extension cord inside to get a different circuit. We have extension cords available to rent for $5. When using extension cords, they must be thick heavy duty cords.

If your bounce house is not inflating, please watch the instructional video again!. You need to make sure you are using all blowers given to you, and that you have zipped up all zippers around the bounce house (there could be up to 3 zippers).

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5
Cancellation_Policy__c:
Items are only reserved with a deposit. If a deposit has not been paid, items are available only on a first come, first served basis.
We have the best cancellation policy out there!
Your deposit will be fully refunded if the rented items are able to be rented to someone else. That means, the more notice we are given - the more likely a refund will be issued. That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.
Acknowledgement__c:
All rentals are for customer pickup and dropoff at our location in American Fork, Utah. All items are due by 9am on the business day following your reservation. We are available to load and unload all customers, unless you use our after-hours drop-off or prefer to load/unload yourself.

Store_Description__c: Our most cost-conscious bouncer for the little ones. Perfect for a small party! 10'x12'x8'. Good for 3-5 kids age 8 and under. Works indoor or out.  This bounce house can be transported by one person and will fit in a sedan.
General_Info__c:
This bounce house is for ages 8 and under and 3-5 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a sedan or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 2 people for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house can fit in a sedan and can be lifted by 1 person. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and trunk space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Operating Instructions

Please watch the following video:https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

This bouncer may require two blowers for operation, and the short yellow deflation tube may be used for the second blower. When using two blowers, each blower needs to be on a separate electrical circuit or you may burn up the blower and/or trip your breaker. Often all outdoor outlets are on the same circuit, so you may need to run an extension cord inside to get a different circuit. We have extension cords available to rent for $5. When using extension cords, they must be thick heavy duty cords.

If your bounce house is not inflating, please watch the instructional video again!. You need to make sure you are using all blowers given to you, and that you have zipped up all zippers around the bounce house (there could be up to 3 zippers).

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5
Cancellation_Policy__c:
Items are only reserved with a deposit. If a deposit has not been paid, items are available only on a first come, first served basis.
We have the best cancellation policy out there!
Your deposit will be fully refunded if the rented items are able to be rented to someone else. That means, the more notice we are given - the more likely a refund will be issued. That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.
Acknowledgement__c:
All rentals are for customer pickup and dropoff at our location in American Fork, Utah. All items are due by 9am on the business day following your reservation. We are available to load and unload all customers, unless you use our after-hours drop-off or prefer to load/unload yourself.

Store_Description__c: The hottest new game for any group has finally arrived at Utah's top rental company! Come try out 9 Square at your next family reunion, party, or event. Kids (and adults) of all ages will have a blast!  Add on our blacklights and turn your 9 square game into an epic party! Store_Description__c: Girls only, guys forbidden!  This huge bouncer will make any princess party a succuss.  At this price point, you just can't get any better.  12'x12'x8'
General_Info__c:
This bounce house is for ages 10 and under and 8-10 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a sedan or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 1 person for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house needs a van or bigger and requires 2 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Operating Instructions

Please watch the following video:https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

This bouncer may require two blowers for operation, and the short yellow deflation tube may be used for the second blower. When using two blowers, each blower needs to be on a separate electrical circuit or you may burn up the blower and/or trip your breaker. Often all outdoor outlets are on the same circuit, so you may need to run an extension cord inside to get a different circuit. We have extension cords available to rent for $5. When using extension cords, they must be thick heavy duty cords.

If your bounce house is not inflating, please watch the instructional video again!. You need to make sure you are using all blowers given to you, and that you have zipped up all zippers around the bounce house (there could be up to 3 zippers).

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5

Store_Description__c: This lasertag set is so much fun and SOOO easy to get up and running.  Power on the guns, select your team, and you're off and running!  During gameplay you can quickly switch to a pistol, shotgun, burst machine gun, or grenade launcher!  Each gun mode shoots, sounds, and damages differently.  Once you lose 9 lives, you're out!  At $3 per gun per day, you can't beat the price and it will be the easiest party you've ever planned.  Grab as many guns as you need!
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions so that you come prepared for your rental. We do ask that you return your laser tag equipment is the same condition it was received. Please handle and store the guns with care. The guns can withstand light rain, but they should not get wet. The guns take AA batteries, and although we test the guns between each rental it is impossible to tell how long the guns will last on their current batteries. We usually try to include some extra AA batteries with the rental, but it would be a good idea to have some extras on hand as well. Clean off any dirt or debris, and then store the guns back the same way they were received. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Refer to the instruction sheet that comes with the guns for use.

 

Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation.

10 Metallic Barriers/Walls = $25

Store_Description__c: Regular Twister is just plain boring!  Spice it up with our inflatable 3D Twister board.  This is so fun for kids birthday parties and get togethers.  Intended for younger kids and tweens, there is a max capacity for this game and is not suitable for adults.  It is not to be treated like a bounce house.  Call or text today to reserve!
General_Info__c:
The 3D Twoster is for ages 10 and under and 8-10 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a mini van, SUV or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 2 people for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

The Twister game needs a van or bigger and requires 2 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc.  We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances.   Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Instructional Video

https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

 

Add-on Items

Generator $40

Extension Cord $5

Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions and watch the required videos so that you come prepared for your rental. We do ask that you return your equipment clean and organized. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

The FM transmitter does not have unlimited range. It works best in an open area and on an FM station that is not used by anything else locally. It will do best in an area the size of 1-2 acres. It has a high and low setting. To toggle between high and low power settings, Unplug unit from the wall outlet, Press and hold down power switch. While holding power switch pressed, plug unit back into wall outlet. Using the "up", "down" buttons toggle between "H" and "L". The receiver takes an AUX cord (3.5mm) as in input for sound, or takes a 3.5mm microphone. Do not plug anything except a microphone into the "MIC" input. It has no sound output, other than the FM station it broadcasts to. Please make sure all included cords and the antenna are returned with the unit.

Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions so that you come prepared for your rental. The product you are dispensing MUST be in a #10 can or in the canister that can be added to the rental for $5. If product is put directly into the dispenser, it will scald/burn and will ruin the dispenser. A $100 fine will be enforced if product is dumped into the dispenser directly. Add 5.5 cups of water around the #10 can or canister. The product will take an hour or two to get up to temperature. It is recommended that you stir the product often while it is heating to prevent scalding. For quicker heating, you may heat your product on a stove or in a microwave and then dump it back into the #10 can or rented canister.

Please DO NOT TAKE APART THE DISPENSER to clean it. There are many little parts inside the spout and pump that can be easily lost. We just ask you wipe down the cabinet and get your product out of the machine, we will do the deep cleaning. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

Two independent side speakers produce 200 watts of peak power audio. Need even more sound? The WiFi pedestal can output audio to any of our other external audio systems. Store_Description__c: Our foam machines are the hit of any party, and we rent them for WAYYY cheaper than anyone else. We've found the secret is in the sauce, and we supply the best foam solution you can buy. Our foam solution is $15, which fills 50 gallons and lasts about a 1/2hr of continuous use (this thing kicks out so much foam people usually turn it off and on as needed)! The foam we supply is hypo-allergenic and safe for the environment. You will need a garden hose, or rent ours for $5.
Instructional_Videos__c:
The foam machine has a few parts: The actual foam machine, a solution pump, a large barrel for holding the solution, and a stand to elevate the foam machine. The foam machine must be elevated at least 5ft from the ground, so it doesn't inhale the foam it has created. You can use our provided stand, or you may securely hang the machine on your own. You will also need a good source of power, as the foam machine and the solution pump each require power from a standard household outlet. Many people also add on an additional blower (to blow the foam around) and our inflatable foam pit, and those also each require their own power. You will not be able to power all 4 items on a single circuit.
1. Elevate the foam machine with our provided stand, or by some other, secure method. If you use our stand, assemble the "T" bar on top of the tripod, and then slide the foam machine onto the "T" bar through the handle of the machine. When using our stand, please don't over-tighten any of the knobs, it will strip out the threading. They only need to be snug.
2. Fill the provided barrel with water. Add the foam solution to the water, and stir for 1-2 minutes.
3. Connect the foam machine to the solution pump using a standard garden hose. The hose should not be longer than 50ft.
4. Set the solution pump at the bottom of the barrel. First plug in and turn on the foam machine. Then plug in the solution pump to turn it on.
5. It is advised to unplug the solution pump as the foam builds up. The barrel of solution will last about 30 minutes of continuous use, but it can be stretched much further by unplugging once there is adequate foam buildup, and then plugging it back in when more foam is desired.
6. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO HOLD THE FOAM MACHINE WHILE IT IS RUNNING. Many people are tempted to hold the machine and move it around to spread out the foam, but this very dangerous. If you desire to move the foam around or blow it around, please rent our extra blower for $10.
7. Once finished, please rinse and dry out the barrel. Also rinse and dry off the stand. Pack items neatly once they are all dry.
General_Info__c:
We require you to purchase the foam solution from us.
One solution mix is $15 and will last for 30 minutes of use.
Any unused foam solutions can be returned for a refund.
We ask that all foam be ordered 2-3 days before pick up.
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions so that you come prepared for your rental. We do ask that you return the equipment clean.  Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

You will need 2 power outlets for the foam machine (1 for the foam generator and 1 for the siphon pump). You will also need a garden hose to connect the siphon pump to the foam generator. The hose must be 50ft or shorter. You may rent a garden hose and extension cords through us if needed. Please make sure the barrel is rinsed out and dry before putting items into it for storage. The foam is environmentally friendly and hypo-allergenic.

It is very important that the foam generator is elevated so the foam does not get sucked back into the electronics. Usually raised 4-5 ft is sufficient. DO NOT HOLD THE FOAM GENERATOR WHILE IT IS RUNNING! We provide a stand for the foam machine, or you may raise it using some other method. But please make sure it stays dry and away from the foam. When using our elevating stand, please do not over-tighten the adjustment knobs. It strips out the screw threads and ruins the stand.

 

Operating Instructions

Click here for operating instructions

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation.

Foam Solution $15/50 gallons (lasts 1/2 hr of continuous use)

Inflatable Pit $50

Extension Cord $5

Garden Hose $5

Extra Blower (to blow foam around) $10

Generator $40

Store_Description__c:
Just like the State Fair - create perfect cotton candy with this industrial machine. It produces 147 servings an hour! When combined with another rental item of equal or greater value - we discount the machine 50%!
Sugar Floss= $9 (50-60 servings)
Cones/Sticks = $3 for 50 or $5 for 100
Plastic Bags = $7 for 100
Cotton candy flavors: bubblegum, blue raspberry, pink vanilla, banana, lemon, pina colada, strawberry, grape, cherry, lime, orange, and watermelon.
Instructional_Videos__c:
1. Make sure the metal bowl is buckled to the machine with all 4 buckles. The left front buckle has a switch that disables the power to the machine if the bowl is not securely attached.
2. Place the machine on a solid surface. The rubber feet on the bottom of the machine may leave marks on some surfaces, so place a towel under the machine to avoid damage.
3. Turn on the motor for 2 minutes to warm up the machine motor.
4. Turn on the heat, and allow the machine 3-4 minutes to heat up.
5. Pour your sugar floss into a container that allows you to scoop servings with the provided metal scoop (they are single serve scoops, so you can control the finished cone size based on how full the scoop is).
6. Dump the scoop into the middle of the machine head, and immediately start rotating the paper cone above the machine to gather the product. Continue to rotate the cone until the floss has stopped producing.
7. Every 30 minutes (while the machine is still running and hot) pour 3-5 scoops full of water into the head of the machine to steam clean it. HOT STEAM will come out of the machine, so please use caution and be prepared. It is important to do this every 30 minutes to keep the machine clean and functioning properly. Wait 2-3 minutes after steam cleaning before resuming normal operation of the machine. There is no need to dry out the machine or the bowl until you are completely finished using the machine.
8. When finished making cotton candy, clean the bowl and dome top. Do not attempt to clean out the machine head. You may wipe down the cabinet of the machine as needed.

CAUTION: The head of the machine and base of the machine gets very hot. Allow the machine adequate time to cool before moving and packing up the machine.
General_Info__c:
The supplies are not included with the machine rental.
We ask that all supply orders be placed 2-3 days before your rental date.
Sugar Floss= $9 (50-60 servings)
Cones/Sticks = $3 for 50 or $5 for 100
Plastic Bags = $7 for 100
Cotton candy flavors: bubblegum, blue raspberry, pink vanilla, banana, lemon, pina colada, strawberry, grape, cherry, lime, orange, and watermelon.

Store_Description__c: It doesn't get cuter than this happy hippo for hoppin' around! This bounce house is good for 3-5 kids, 5 years old and younger. 10x7x7. This bounce house can be transported by one person and will fit in a sedan.

Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house can fit in a sedan and can be lifted by 1 person. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and trunk space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Instructional Video

Your deposit will be fully refunded if the rented items are able to be rented to someone else. That means, the more notice we are given - the more likely a refund will be issued. That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.
Acknowledgement__c:
All rentals are for customer pickup and dropoff at our location in American Fork, Utah. All items are due by 9am on the business day following your reservation. We are available to load and unload all customers, unless you use our after-hours drop-off or prefer to load/unload yourself.

Store_Description__c: Gaga is so much fun at parties, for school activities, or as a group of friends.  You can find the instructions and rules for the game here: https://www.gagacenter.com/nyc/about/what-is-gaga/.  This inflatable pit is also the most popular add-on for our foam machine, to give your guests that mosh pit they've always dreamed about!
General_Info__c:
The Gaga Pit has a15 ft diameter, and is approx 8x8.
Recommended for 10-12 people.
Description__c:
General Instructions

The inflatable foam pit/Gaga arena needs a van or bigger and requires 2 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return the pit clean and dry. Please sweep off grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc.  We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the pit away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances.   Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Setup Instructions

Click here for operating instructions
