Generator $25 a day

Extension Cord $5

Store_Description__c: Beep! Beep!  Incoming firetruck madness!  This is such a fun unit for kids 10 years old and younger (6-8 kids total).   Perfect for a hot, blazing summer day - but it also works great as a dry bouncer/slide and fits under 8ft ceilings!  16'x12'x7.5'.  This bounce house requires 2 people to transport and will fit in a van or SUV.
General_Info__c:
This bounce house is for ages 10 and under and 5-7 kids at a time.
You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own
You will need a mini van, SUV or bigger to transport this item
This item requires 2 people for setup/lifting
You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house needs a van or bigger and requires 2 people to lift. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc. We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 

You are required to bring help to unload the unit when using the after hours return option. We require you to stack high and in specific locations so that there is space for everyone. Because of that, it will normally require more than 1 person.

 

Operating Instructions

Please watch the following video:https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

This bouncer may require two blowers for operation, and the short yellow deflation tube may be used for the second blower. When using two blowers, each blower needs to be on a separate electrical circuit or you may burn up the blower and/or trip your breaker. Often all outdoor outlets are on the same circuit, so you may need to run an extension cord inside to get a different circuit. We have extension cords available to rent for $5. When using extension cords, they must be thick heavy duty cords.

If your bounce house is not inflating, please watch the instructional video again!. You need to make sure you are using all blowers given to you, and that you have zipped up all zippers around the bounce house (there could be up to 3 zippers).

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3

Generator $40

Don't let the size of this machine fool you, this ice shaver packs a mean punch! Get authentic snow without having to deal with the hassle of block ice. It really is an impressive machine, and we know you will be surprised at the results! This machine is 50% off when combined with another item of equal or greater value!
Syrup = $7 a liter (serves 20-40)
Spoon Straws = $5/100
Flower Cups = $9/25
Cone Cups = $7/100
Syrup flavors: Tiger's Blood, Blue Raspberry, Bahama Mama, Wild Cherry, Pina Colada, Lemon-Lime, Root Beer, Dreamsycle, Banana, Blue Hawaiian, Mango, Pink Bubble Gum, Cola, Grape, Strawberry, Watermelon, and Blue Cotton Candy. They are authentic, high quality flavors like you'd get at an ice shack.
Instructional_Videos__c:
This machine operates on a standard household 110v plug. To operate the machine, place ice cubes in the top. We've found bigger, hard (solidly frozen), and rounded ice cubes produce the best product, but the machine will shave up any ice you throw in the top. If the ice is soft and melting, the machine will produce ice more like slush than snow. Place a cup or bowl beneath the output, and then press down on the lid to turn on the machine. Please note that the machine is quite loud!
To clean the machine, rinse with HOT water until all ice particles are melted, and then dry thoroughly! If all of the ice isn't melted and dried from the machine, it will cause rust - resulting in poor operation and dulled blades. This is a very simple cleaning process, so we ask you please do your part to keep our machines in good working order!
General_Info__c:
The supplies are not included in the machine rental.
We ask that all supply orders be placed 2-3 days before your rental date.
Syrup = $7 a liter (serves 20-40)
Spoon Straws = $5/100
Flower Cups = $9/25
Cone Cups = $7/100
Syrup flavors: Tiger's Blood, Blue Raspberry, Bahama Mama, Wild Cherry, Pina Colada, Lemon-Lime, Root Beer, Dreamsycle, Banana, Blue Hawaiian, Mango, Pink Bubble Gum, Cola, Grape, Strawberry, Watermelon, and Blue Cotton Candy. They are authentic, high quality flavors like you'd get at an ice shack.
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions so that you come prepared for your rental. We do ask that you return your equipment clean and dry. The blade and surface should be wiped dry when you are finished to avoid rusting. Please also wipe down sticky surfaces. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Operating Instructions

This machine operates on a standard household 110v plug. To operate the machine, place ice cubes in the top. We've found bigger, hard (solidly frozen), and rounded ice cubes produce the best product, but the machine will shave up any ice you throw in the top. If the ice is soft and melting, the machine will produce ice more like slush than snow. Place a cup or bowl beneath the output, and then press down on the lid to turn on the machine. Please note that the machine is quite loud!

To clean the machine, rinse with HOT water until all ice particles are melted, and then dry thoroughly! If all of the ice isn't melted and dried from the machine, it will cause rust - resulting in poor operation and dulled blades. This is a very simple cleaning process, so we ask you please do your part to keep our machines in good working order!

Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation

Syrup $7 a liter (serves 20-40)

Syrup flavors: Tiger's Blood, Blue Raspberry, Bahama Mama, Wild Cherry, Pina Colada, Lemon-Lime, Root Beer, Dreamsycle, Banana, Blue Hawaiian, Mango, Pink Bubble Gum, Cola, Grape, Strawberry, Watermelon, and Blue Cotton Candy. They are authentic, high quality flavors like you'd get at an ice shack.

Spoon Straws $5/100

Flower Cups $9/25

Cone Cups $7/100
Cancellation_Policy__c:
Items are only reserved with a deposit. If a deposit has not been paid, items are available only on a first come, first served basis.
We have the best cancellation policy out there!
Your deposit will be fully refunded if the rented items are able to be rented to someone else. That means, the more notice we are given - the more likely a refund will be issued. That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.

Store_Description__c: **We ship this machine anywhere in the continental US! If you need the machine shipped, the date chosen on our website needs to be the day you are using the machine at your event (choose just a 1 day rental).  All orders must be placed more than 1 week prior to that day.  All shipping orders must have a $50 shipping charge per machine (includes a return label) added to the order, you will see this option when you add the machine to cart. (i.e. if you want 2 machines, you must add 2 shipping charges). We can potentially rush order your shipment, please call or text us for that pricing.**  Add that magical effect to any event with our cold spark firework machine!  The machine can be remotely fired using a wireless remote.  They are most commonly used at weddings and stage events - but it is super fun for sports teams and other grand entrances! Sparks fly 10-15ft in the air.The powder is $15 and is good for 2-3 magical bursts of sparks (1 minute each). If you are local to American Fork, UT then normal pickup & dropoff times and rates apply.
Instructional_Videos__c:
How to program the remote:

Press the menu button until L - - H appears on the screen. Press and hold the A button on the remote, until A001 appears on the screen. Note: this may turn off the machine, so if the yellow light isn't solid or blinking - press the A button on the remote to turn it back on.

How to operate:

The machine will take up to 5 minutes to heat. The current temperature of the machine will be displayed on the screen. It will need to heat over 500 in order to be Ready. A blinking yellow light indicates the machine is Not Ready and a solid yellow light will indicate the machine is Ready when it is heated above 500. The machine can not be fired until the yellow light is solid. If there is no yellow light, the machine has been turned off by the remote. Press the A button on the remote to turn it back on.
It is recommended to use separate remotes for each machine. This gives the most reliable, consistent firing results. Assign 1 operator for each machine and have that person have their own remote to fire their machine. Multiple machines can be programmed to 1 remote if desired. Follow the procedure above for each machine, but make sure the other machines are turned off with the red power switch while programming. Keep in mind that each machine needs to receive a signal to Fire so if all machines are operating on 1 remote and 1 machine doesn't get the signal, it won't fire with the others. If you don;t have separate operators for each machine and need to do multiple machines at once with 1 remote - we recommend standing far away from the machines with each machine slightly turned to your position so the remote is essentially pointing at each machine at the same time. You will want to test this to ensure your location signals each machine simultaneously.

A button: Turns the machine on and off. If you see a yellow blinking or solid light on the back of the machine, the machine is on. Otherwise it is off.
_B button: Turns on and off low firing mode.
C button: Turns on and off medium firing mode.
_D button: Turns on and off high firing mode.

Safety:
*Do not carry or move the machines while they are plugged in and powered on.
*Make sure there is nothing flammable above or below or around each machine.
*The machines get hot! Do not touch them until they have cooled for several minutes.
*Only used cold spark powder provided by Plan-it Rentals. Other powders may cause damage.
*Keep people away from the sparks, and do not allow horseplay around the machines.
*If machines are on, they must have constant supervision. Otherwise turn them off.
*Do not shoot sparks for more than 1 minute straight, otherwise it will damage the motor.
General_Info__c:
You must purchase the spark powder from us for $15/pouch.
One pouch will last for 2-3, 1 minute bursts.
We ship this machine anywhere in the continental US! If you need the machine shipped, the date chosen on our website needs to be the date of your event. All orders must be placed more than 1 week prior to that day. All shipping orders must have a $100 shipping charge added to the order, you will see this option when you add the machine to cart. We can potentially rush order your shipment, please call or text us for that pricing.
Description__c:
General Instructions

Please read the following instructions so that you come prepared for your rental. We ask that you return the machine in the same condition you received it. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

How to program the remote:
The remote that comes with each machine will already be programmed to that corresponding machine. The most reliable, consistent way to fire the machine is to have 1 person work each machine with each separate remote (so if you have 4 machines, it is best to have 4 people, each assigned to a machine). To program a remote, or to program multiple machines to 1 remote, press the menu button until L - - H appears on the screen. Press and hold the A button on the remote, until A001 appears on the screen. Note: this may turn off the machine, so if the yellow light isn't solid or blinking - press the A button on the remote to turn it back on.

How to operate:
The machine will take up to 5 minutes to heat. The current temperature of the machine will be displayed on the screen. It will need to heat over 500 in order to be "Ready." A blinking yellow light indicates the machine is "Not Ready" and a solid yellow light will indicate the machine is "Ready" when it is heated above 500. The machine can not be fired until the yellow light is solid. If there is no yellow light, the machine has been turned off by the remote. Press the A button on the remote to turn it back on. It is recommended to use separate remotes for each machine. This gives the most reliable, consistent firing results. Assign 1 operator for each machine and have that person have their own remote to fire their machine. Multiple machines can be programmed to 1 remote if desired. Follow the procedure above for each machine, but make sure the other machines are turned off with the red power switch while programming. Keep in mind that each machine needs to receive a signal to "Fire" so if all machines are operating on 1 remote and 1 machine doesn't get the signal, it won't fire with the others. If you don't have separate operators for each machine and need to do multiple machines at once with 1 remote - we recommend standing far away from the machines with each machine slightly turned to your position so the remote is essentially pointing at each machine at the same time. You will want to test this to ensure your location signals each machine simultaneously.
A button: Turns the machine on and off. If you see a yellow blinking or solid light on the back of the machine, the machine is on. Otherwise it is off.
B button: Turns on and off low firing mode.
C button: Turns on and off medium firing mode.
D button: Turns on and off high firing mode.

Safety:
*Do not carry or move the machines while they are plugged in and powered on.
*Make sure there is nothing flammable above or below or around each machine.
*The machines get hot! Do not touch them until they have cooled for several minutes.
*Only used cold spark powder provided by Plan-it Rentals. Other powders may cause damage.
*Keep people away from the sparks, and do not allow horseplay around the machines.
*If machines are on, they must have constant supervision. Otherwise turn them off.
*Do not shoot sparks for more than 1 minute straight, otherwise it will damage the motor.

Add-on Items

In order to prepare your add-on items, please place your order 2-3 business days prior to your reservation.

Spark Powder $15 (2-3 minutes of sparks)

Extension Cord $5

Store_Description__c: Need a start/finish line for the 5k you're hosting?  We've got ya covered!  Perfect for fun runs, marathons, or even for sports teams and entrances and exits to events.  Create your own banner for each side (banner measurement is 2ft x 8ft) or rent our start/finish banners for just $5. The arch is 20ft wide and stands 12ft tall.
Description__c:
General Instructions

The inflatable arch requires 1 person to lift, but does need 2 people for setup. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and cargo space is available. We do ask that you return the arch clean and dry. Please sweep off grass, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc.  We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please deflate and put the arch away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather or other unforeseen circumstances.   Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the inflatable getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out. Make sure the arch is securely anchored and staked at all times.

Operating Instructions

Before inflating the arch, slide the banners inside the plastic pocket.__ Please be careful not to rip the pocket.__ Attach the provided blower, and zip up the pocket located near the blower tube.__ The blower remains running while the arch is inflated.__ Secure the arch with tie downs and stakes.__ To deflate, turn off the blower and unzip the pocket.__ Allow the arch to deflate for 10 minutes before rolling and storing in the provided carrying bag.

Add-on Items

Start/Finish Banners - $5

Indoor Sandbags - $10/4

Extension Cord - $5

Description__c:
General Instructions

This bounce house can fit in a sedan and can be lifted by 1 person. Be mindful of other items on your order, though, when considering space in your vehicle, and make sure seat and trunk space is available. We do ask that you return your bounce house clean and dry. Please leave your blower on until your unit is dry. A reasonable effort should be made to dry the bounce house if it is used wet (the videos give you more detail on this), and if a tarp is rented from us it should be hung to dry also. Please sweep out grass, pick up candy wrappers, wipe spots with a damp rag, etc.  We want to spend our efforts on sanitizing the equipment, not the general cleaning and drying. Your efforts will help us keep our pricing low and our service great!

 

Please put the bounce house away when it is not being used. Leaving it out and unattended may result in damage from unexpected weather, pets, or other unforeseen circumstances. Rain or sprinkler systems also often catch people off-guard and then result in the bounce house getting wet without time to adequately dry it back out.

 


Instructional Video

https://youtu.be/6DkhovLffVc

 

Add-on Items

Tarp $5

Plastic Play Balls 100 for $3, we recommend 500 for a full ball pit.

Extension Cord $5
Cancellation_Policy__c:
Items are only reserved with a deposit. If a deposit has not been paid, items are available only on a first come, first served basis.
We have the best cancellation policy out there!
Your deposit will be fully refunded if the rented items are able to be rented to someone else. That means, the more notice we are given - the more likely a refund will be issued. That refund will only be issued once the item has been picked up and paid for by the replacement customer. If we are unable to rent the item to another customer, 100% of the deposit can be used as a future credit on any rental, and on any item! An additional deposit must still be collected to reserve another item, and the credit will be used on the remaining balance that is due at pickup.
If a reservation is cancelled after 9:00am the day PRIOR to your pickup day (24 hours before reservation), then 100% of the deposit is forfeited (no refund and no issued credit). In case of inclement weather, the 24hr cancellation policy will be waived and the deposit can be used as a future credit (unless we are able to re-rent the items to another customer, then a full refund will be issued). It is suggested that you arrange an alternate, indoor location for your event in case of weather. Determining what classifies as inclement weather and the waiving of the 24hr cancellation policy is at the discretion of Plan-it Rentals.
Acknowledgement__c:
All rentals are for customer pickup and dropoff at our location in Cedar Park, TX. Items are due back by 9am the business day after your reservation. We are available to help load and unload all customers at our facility.

This bounce house is only intended for ages 5 and under and 3-5 kids at a time.

You must place a tarp under this inflatable, please add our tarp for $5 if you don't have your own

You will need a sedan or bigger to transport this item

This item requires 1 person for setup/lifting

You understand the inflatable needs to be returned clean and dry
